Title: Rebel Without a Cause
Writer: Stewart Stern (screen play), Irving Shulman (adaptation), Nicholas Ray (from a story by)
Actors: James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo, Jim Backus
Plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
